backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor canister with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping background animation and tuning features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including UI components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables and theme values for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering the hero section, buttons, floating background, confetti, and message overlays.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsRo: Canvas animation component that renders floating hearts and roses using particle motion and resize-aware drawing.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenMessag: Fullscreen modal overlay showing a message with scroll lock, escape handling, and a close button.
frontend/src/components/RoseConfetti.tsx: Canvas-based falling roseâ€‘petal confetti effect triggered on button click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React provider and hook managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, stored identities, and context access.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles plus custom CSS variables, light/dark themes, and component classes for gradients, typography, and UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint configuring React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and loading plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, UI behavior, and architectural notes for the Rose Day proposal site.
